attributes.action: Covid Emergency - Act now and announce a nation-wide 'circuit breaker'.
attributes.additional_details:
It is crystal clear, the numbers are raising everywhere in the UK. The R number is well above 1, we have to act now in order to prevent an exponential rise in cases and deaths.  
The Government must not repeat the mistakes from the first wave. No more delays, half-hearted action and postponed decisions. The three-tier lockdown system is clearly not working. 
We need a 3-4 weeks national circuit-breaker, financial support for the economy and clear guidance. It is actually quite easy, we just have to do it. Let's do it.
attributes.background: Covid-19, the second wave: The government has to act now and announce a nation-wide 'circuit breaker' in order to reduce the spread of the virus and avoid catastrophic consequences over the next few months. It is important to impose the lockdown as soon as possible, every day counts.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, from 5 November to 2 December: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736
